CMD_BOOKMARKS_SYNC: Use Bookmarks as Manual Sync Points
IDC_MANUAL_SYNC_CHECK: Warn about active manual sync points
IDC_CLOSE_ON_MATCH: Prompt to close files on match
IDC_GOTO_FIRST_DIFF: Go to first diff after re-Compare
IDC_CHANGE_RESEMBL: Min line resemblance to mark as changed [%]
IDC_ENABLE_TOOLBAR: Add the following to the toolbar:
IDC_NOTE: NOTE: First line can never be hidden
CONFIG_DIR_FAIL:
Notepad++ plugins config folder
'%s'
doesn't exist and failed to be created.
Cannot write configuration file.
SQLITE_FAIL: Failed to initialize SQLite - operation aborted.
LIBGIT_FAIL: Failed to initialize LibGit2 - operation aborted.
STATUS_CHANGED: FILE CHANGED, COMPARE RESULTS MIGHT BE INACCURATE!
SUMMARY_NO_IGNORE: No extra Detect and Ignore options used
MSG_CMD_LINE_AMBIGUOUS:
Command line file name ambiguous (several opened files with that name) - compare aborted.
Either use full file paths or add '-nosession' option to command line.
MSG_NOT_COMPATIBLE:
%s version is not compatible with current Notepad++ version.
Plugin will be disabled.
MSG_MARKER_ALLOC_FAIL:
Notepad++ marker allocation for visualizing diff changes failed.
Default one will be used but conflicts with other plugins might appear.
Please switch to Notepad++ version 8.5.6 or newer.
MSG_MARGIN_ALLOC_FAIL:
Allocating new margin for compare diff symbols failed.
Lines diff symbols will not be visible.
MSG_ALREADY_COMPARED: File '%s' is already compared - operation ignored.
MSG_ENCODINGS:
Trying to compare files with different encodings - the result might be inaccurate and misleading.

Compare anyway?
MSG_NO_SELECTIONS: No valid selections to compare - operation ignored.
MSG_NOT_WRITTEN: File is not written to disk - operation ignored.
MSG_TEMP_FAIL: Creating temp file failed - operation aborted.
MSG_ONLY_ONE: Only one file opened - operation ignored.
MSG_COMPARE_TO_CLONE: Trying to compare file to its clone - operation ignored.
MSG_CLIPBOARD_EMPTY: Clipboard does not contain any text to compare.
MSG_LARGE_FILES:
Comparing large files such as these might take significant time especially if they differ a lot.

Compare anyway?
MSG_EOL_DIFFERENT:
Seems like files differ in line endings (EOL). If that's the case all lines will appear different.

Would you like to ignore EOL differences for this compare?
MSG_MANUAL_SYNC:
There are existing bookmarks that will be used as manual sync points.

Would you like to disable manual sync for this compare?
MSG_SEL_COMPARING: Comparing selected lines in '%s' vs. selected lines in '%s'...
MSG_NO_UNIQUE: Files '%s' and '%s' do not contain unique lines.
MSG_SEL_NO_UNIQUE: Selections in files '%s' and '%s' do not contain unique lines.
MSG_NOT_MODIFIED: File '%s' has not been modified since last Save.
MSG_SEL_CLIPBOARD_MATCH: Selection in file '%s' has no changes against clipboard.
MSG_CLIPBOARD_MATCH: File '%s' has no changes against clipboard.
MSG_GIT_MATCH: File '%s' has no changes against Git.
MSG_SVN_MATCH: File '%s' has no changes against SVN.
MSG_IGNORED_DIFFS: Diffs exist but have been ignored due to the compare options.
MSG_REPLACED: Compared file text replaced by Notepad++. Please manually re-compare to make sure compare results are valid!
MSG_HIDDEN_NOT_POSSIBLE: Operation not possible while diffs are hidden.
MSG_PATCH_NO_UNIQUE: Patch generation for 'Find Unique' commands is currently not supported.
MSG_PATCH_NO_MODIFIED:
Compared file is modified, generating patch is not possible.
Please manually re-compare and try again.
MSG_PATCH_WARN_IGNORE: Some ignore options are enabled. Please note that the patch file might contain ignored portions and might insert such when applied!
MSG_PATCH_SAVE_FAIL: Failure to open file for writing.
MSG_PATCH_APPLY_FAIL:
Patch file failed to apply on '%s'.
File is either modified or patch file is invalid.
